annotations.description: Cobra Kai season 3 is coming to Netflix in January and I have made the essential drink for you to enjoy while you tune in. I was a huge HUGE fan of the 1984 ...
annotations.title: Badass Drink for Cobra Kai | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Orange Juice
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Passionfruit Juice
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Lime Juice
2 dashes Angostura aromatic bitters
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Orgeat
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Velvet Falernum
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Ancho Reyes
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Aged Rum
.25 oz. -or- 8ml. Lemon Hart 151

Peel entire orange peel
Crack ice and shake ingredients
Half open gate pour into brandy snifter
Garnish with orange peel "snake" and lime boat
Fire optional and garnish with cinnamon

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJD-yqoX2xM
title: Cobra Kaitale
